float: Ethnic composition (2009)  |- |Azerbaijani||91.60% |- |Lezgian||2.02% |- |Armenian||1.35% |- |Russian||1.34% |- |Talysh||1.26% |- |Other nations||2.43% |}  The ethnic composition of the population according to the 2009 population census: 91.60% Azerbaijanis, 2.02% Lezgians, 1.35% Armenians (almost all Armenians live in the break-away region of Nagorno-Karabakh), 1.34% Russians, 1.26% Talysh, 0.56% Avars, 0.43% Turks, 0.29% Tatars, 0.28% Tats, 0.24% Ukrainians, 0.14% Tsakhurs, 0.11% Georgians, 0.10% Jews, 0.07% Kurds, other 0.21%.  ===Urbanization===  Azərbaycan Respublikasının Dövlət Statistika Komitəsi. Stat.gov.az. Retrieved on 1 July 2017.   ===Languages===
